title: Superencipherment
content:
[[=]]
,,**<<** [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/aiad-homescreen HUB] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/alert-lockdown-initiated Part I] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/command-query-separation Part II] | ##blue|Part III: Superencipherment## | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/clock-multiplier Part IV] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/null-terminating-string Part V] **>>**,,
[[/=]]
----
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module css]]
.hover {
}
.hover:hover {
 	text-decoration: none;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.hover span {	display: none;}
.hover:hover span {
    position: absolute;
    display: inline;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    background: #FFF;
    border: 2px solid #34B;
    color: #000;
    padding: 1em;
}
.hover:hover span span {
    position: relative;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
}
[[/module]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
You called?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image alex4.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Alexandra, Site-17 has gone dark.  Have you been able to get a connection through in the last few hours?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
I haven't tried recently.  How long have they been out?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Only 3 hours, but it's long enough to rule out a communications error.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Glacon hasn't said anything?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
No.  Do me a favor and see if you can get a packet over to him through one of the other tertiary channels.  Okay?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
I can.  So when are the response teams going to be called?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
The director is going to give them another 4 hours.  Then they'll force their way in.  Probably with an MTF or two on standby.  Standard procedure.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Alright, I'll try from my end.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
I have to take care of some other things.  Keep me posted. 

You alright?
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Yes, I'm fine.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image alex4.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Good.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image lurk2.png width="75px" style="margin-left: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float: right; text-align: right; margin: 0 0 10px 10px; width: 240px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 3pt; background-color: #7F7F7F; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#fff0f0; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#8b8b8b), to(#7F7F7F)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #656565); background:-o-linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); background:linear-gradient(#8b8b8b, #7F7F7F); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
.
[[div style="text-align: center; padding: 2px 20px; color: black; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #fff0f0; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px;"]]
::DISCONNECTED::
[[/div]]
.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[>]]
[[image alex_sad_0.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/>]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
What's going on over there, Glacon?  Hmmmm.
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image alex_sad.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
@@@@

[[div style="float:right; width: 240px; text-align: right; margin-top: 0; margin-right: 0; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; padding-right: 10px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
/create PACKET#SITE17 @glacon -1
[[div style="text-align: left; padding: 2px 20px; color: black; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #fff0f0; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px;"]]
@@> message ATTN glacon@@
@@> please respond@@
@@> need update on site17@@
@@> its alex@@
@@> /end@@
[[/div]]
/send SECURE 55.223.698.37
@@@@
@@@@
[[/div]]
[[div]]
[[image alex_worried.png width="75px" style="margin-right: 20px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="text-align: right; margin: auto; width: 240px;"]]
[[div style="color: #f5e9e9; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #009494; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; -webkit-border-radius:30px /70px; -moz-border-radius:30px /70px; border-radius:30px /70px; background:#009494; background:-webkit-gradient(linear, 0 0, 0 100%, from(#00adad), to(#009494)); background:-moz-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:-o-linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); background:linear-gradient(#00adad, #009494); text-align: left; padding-top: 2px; padding-bottom: 2px; padding-right: 20px; padding-left: 20px;"]]
Sending...
[[div style="text-align: center; padding: 2px 20px; color: black; font-size: 8pt; background-color: #fff0f0; font-family: Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; border-radius:30px /70px;"]]
[[image 18-1.gif]] [[image 18-1.gif]] [[image 18-1.gif]]
[[/div]]
@@@@
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="clear: right;"]]
[[/div]]
